content: I'm Joe Tyler and i have team of community managers  from, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30 and more for (  2 to 24 hours daily), depending of numbers CM employed.  to keep your server's chat active, before and after mint, to attract investorsour main objective is to focus on:1-talking about the project 2-keeping your chats active and hyped perfect for event such as presales,minting day etc3-creating exposure with real investors 4-Directing the members on their need as partaining the projects5-correcting any form of disobedience to the rules of the community 6-chatting new members and investors and also encourage them to mint.7. Delete spam messages8.. Talk about web3, crypto. and also have real life conversations And our night engagement skills will be beneficial to the community'sHit me up if interested..
